comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: I'm changing my political party to independent from Democrat because I don't trust either side anymore seems like they're both sides are Crooks and I'm just going to vote for the person I think is right for the position and not related to any party

replies.author: Jewel
replies.text: Welcome!!! I did the same thing this year. I was a lifetime Republican who switched over only to vote for Bernie Sanders. I saw the way the Democratic party runs and have since switched to being an Independent as well. It truly is a great feeling to be away from all the craziness!!!! Happy Halloween.
